song.title: Baffled Conductor
song.info:
A slightly minda, mechanical, odd-sounding bitpop, mildly experimental chip-based tune with more percussive sounds than I usually use.
One of my tunes that bridges the divide between listenable pop and difficult listen experimentation. I think it came out alright, but I guess you'll decide for yourself.
time of 3min01, channels of ten, format is S3M - Scream Tracker 3. created in Impulse Tracker v2.13. commenced 01aug2008@10:17; completed 27jan2015@06:55; released 27jan2015 on the modarchive and traxinspace. speed is 8-3-7-3-8-4-7-2 swing / 122 tempo, pattern length 48, time signature 4/4, samples 7.
